name: 5/3/1 + First Set Last (FSL) Variation
time_per_session_breakdown: Main sets ~10 min + FSL volume ~10-15 min
overview_and_execution: Same main progression as original 5/3/1. After final main set, drop back to the first set’s percentage (~65-70%) for 5×5 (FSL). This adds volume for hypertrophy.
important_notes: FSL is powerful for extra volume. Keep rest moderate so you can handle the 5×5. Deload every 4th week.
volume_metrics: 3 main sets + 5 additional sets = 8 total sets for the main lift
